types.name: Person

properties.name: email
properties.toXmlSchema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <element name="email">
        <simpleType>
            <restriction base="string">
                <pattern value="^.+@.+\..+$"/>
            </restriction>
        </simpleType>
    </element>
</schema>

types.toXmlSchema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <element name="Person" type="Person"/>
    <complexType name="Person">
        <choice>
            <element name="name">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="string"/>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <element name="email">
                <simpleType>
                    <restriction base="string">
                        <pattern value="^.+@.+\..+$"/>
                    </restriction>
                </simpleType>
            </element>
            <element name="age">
                <simpleType/>
            </element>
            <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
        </choice>
    </complexType>
</schema>
